item.longname: Computer (Alarm/Fake shell/Firewall/Lockout/Control, complex/Secure data, specific/Tier 10/Artificial personality/Hardened/Miniaturization/Security IV/Self-charging)
item.name: Computer (Alarm/Fake shell/Firewall/Lockout/Control, complex/Secure data, specific/Tier 10/Artificial personality/Hardened/Miniaturization/Security IV/Self-charging)
Dermal plating, mk 7
item.special_properties: You line your skin with hardened composite plates that deflect physical attacks. You gain an amount of damage reduction that depends on the model of your dermal plating. If you have natural damage reduction equal to or greater than your dermal plating, adding dermal plating increases the value of your natural DR by 1. If you have natural DR of a value less than your dermal plating, the value of DR from your dermal plating increases by 1.

item.name: Prescient Lenses Mk 2
item.special_properties: 1/Day Roll the attack roll or check twice and take the better of the two results.

item.name: Ring of Resistance Mk 4
item.special_properties: +4 on weakest (or choice of weakest) base save

feat.name: Enhanced Resistance
feat.description: You have trained your body to resist a particular type of damage.

feat.name: Extra Resolve
feat.description: Your resolve is stronger than most.

feat.name: Improved Initiative
feat.description: Your quick reflexes allow you to react rapidly to danger.

feat.name: Jet Dash
feat.description: You are swift of foot and can make enormous leaps.

feat.name: Lunge
feat.description: You can strike foes that would normally be out of reach.

feat.name: Master Crafter
feat.description: You can construct things more quickly than most.

feat.name: Nimble Moves
feat.description: You can move across a single obstacle with ease.

feat.name: Skill Focus (Engineering)
feat.description: You are particularly adept at a certain skill.

feat.name: Stand Still
feat.description: You can stop foes that try to move past you.

feat.name: Toughness
feat.description: You have enhanced physical resilience, and harsh conditions or long exertions don't easily tire you.

ability_object.name: Resistance to Electricity
ability_object.description: You may ignore 15 points of Electricity damage each time you take electricity damage.
ability_object.type: SPECIALQUALITY.EXTRAORDINARY.RESISTANCE
